name: TeamFunSize
description:
Arrow keys, WASD, or Gamepad controls to move characters inside of the glowing spaces. Z to confirm moves. All characters can attack 2 spaces away from them (1 diagonally).

A small prototype based on Shining Force. Sprites are all from Final Fantasy Adventure, taken from : https://www.spriters-resource.com/game_boy_gbc/ffadv/
